headline: Republican Is the 26th To Step Down In Congress
abstract: Mr. Roe joins the exodus of Republican lawmakers opting out of re-election before another tough campaign cycle.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON —  Representative Phil Roe, Republican of Tennessee, announced on Friday that he would not seek a seventh term in 2020, becoming the first lawmaker this year to join the exodus of Republican lawmakers opting not to run for re-election as their party eyes another tough campaign cycle.
